title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง 1.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง 1.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

For the purposes of this Part, the following terms shall
have these meanings: (a) Place of
business shall include any location or building which is maintained by the
employer of the licensee. (b) School shall mean instruction, education or training licensed or approved by a
department or agency of this state or training conducted by the armed forces of
the United States except it shall not include extra-curricular activities or
social events for which scholastic credits are not given. (c) One in a position of "loco parentis" to
the licensee is a person who, in relation to the licensee, has on a regular and
extended basis, assumed the character of a parent and is discharging parental
duties as the result of the death, disability, or absence of the natural
parent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15ยง
1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
